name: Photosynthesis (HossamEL2006)
description:
Current WR: 63 (by Ruby)HOW TO PLAY?

Move: WASD or ARROW KEYS

Change mode: SPACE

You control the plant, you can press SPACE to change the mode from "plant" to "walk", or from "walk" to "plant.

In "walk" mode, you can move and escape the CO2 particles, and in "plant" mode, you shoot with some O2 particles, it's the photosynthesis, the force of nature!

Scores:

Please share your highscore in the comments (with a screenshot), a score greater than 10 is a good one, Currently, my highscore is 25.
